data.name: Helix
data.detailed_description:
HELIX is a single player platform action game. Use your special skill of changing gravity and go on a platform adventure of a lifetime. Go fast as you can by upgrading your character and try not to die by dangerous spikes.

Change your gravity


Change your gravity to beat the level by the ways you would have not imagined.

Upgrade your character


You can upgrade your character with the coins that you collected and make your character gain more hearts or speeds to help you out on your great platform adventure.

Assist Mode


Is game too hard for you? Do not worry! WE have Assist Mode to help you out, if you use Assist Mode, the game over will be disabled so you can enjoy the game without any stress!

Die


If you lose all of your hearts during game you'll be sent back to level one and you'll lose all of your coins, so be careful what you do!

data.short_description: HELIX is a single player platform action game. Use your special skill of changing gravity and go on a platform adventure of a lifetime. Go fast as you can by upgrading your character and try not to die by dangerous spikes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • Storage: 155 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX12-capable GPUs
  • Storage: 155 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 155 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 155 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers
